import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import logo from '../img/짭쥐 표지-18_cut.png' const StartPage = () => { const festival_img = require(`../img/축제img/${~~(Math.random()*10)+1}.jpg`) const book_img = require('../img/bookcover.jpg') const logoStyle = { position:'absolute', width:'70%', top:'45vh', left:'15%' } useEffect(()=>{ window.addEventListener('scroll',handleScroll) return () =>{ window.removeEventListener('scroll',handleScroll) } },[]) const handleScroll = () =>{ setLogoTop(window.innerHeight) } return (
{/* 표지 이미지 합쳐서 ㅇㅇ 임시로 div */}
festival
book news
cooking fashion
) } export default StartPage
